REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1311 reute u f BC-EXERCISE-PRICE-SET-ON 06-29 0086

TEXT.TITLE: EXERCISE PRICE SET ON NOKIA EQUITY WARRANT BOND
TEXT.BODY: The exercise price for the warrants attached to the 100 mln dlr eurobond for Finland's Nokia Oy <NOKS.HE> has been fixed, lead manager Morgan Guaranty Ltd said. The five year, par-priced, deal was launched last Thursday and pays five pct. Each 5,000 dlr bond has 134 warrants attached which are each exercisable into one Nokia free preferred share at a price of 169.4 Finnish markka. This compares with today's closing price of 178 markka. REUTER
